TopicTitle: How to easily get rid of debris?

Articles.Content: I was wondering if there is any fairly simple way to do this.

There are two simple ways as far as I know.

Set persistent debris count to 0 in the settings. - Never tried that.

Get a commandmodule into a nice, stable orbit, then switch to debris on the map and simply end their flights. Requires a lot of swingig back and forth from orbital maps and tracking station, but works.
